Package index

Data loading

Loading raw CSV files exported by clinical informatics into R or a database, and basic renaming

read_tidybrookes_csv() read_tidybrookes_delim()
Load data from Epic in delimited (including CSV) format
db_write_tidybrookes_csv() db_write_tidybrookes_delim()
Load data from Epic in delimited format (including CSV) into a database
default_col_types()
Standard column specifications
default_rename() adm_rename() adt_rename() demogs_rename() diagnosis_pl_rename() fsheet_io_rename() fsheet_rename() med_admin_rename() med_hist_rename() med_prescr_rename() radiology_rename() procedures_rename() tests_rename()
Rename to tidy column names
adm_unrename() adt_unrename() demogs_unrename() diagnosis_pl_unrename() fsheet_io_unrename() fsheet_unrename() med_admin_unrename() med_prescr_unrename() radiology_unrename() procedures_unrename() tests_unrename()
Rename from tidy to raw column names

Defining and extracting

Definitions are _add function

condition_add() condition_extract()
Add a new definition of a Diagnosis PL item
fsheet_add() fsheet_extract()
Add and extract flowsheet items
fsheet_io_add() fsheet_io_extract()
Add a new definition of a flowsheet item
med_admin_add() med_admin_extract()
Add a new definition of a medication administration drug
med_prescr_add() med_prescr_extract()
Add a new definition of a test item
radiology_add() radiology_extract()
Add a new definition of a radiology item
tests_add() tests_extract()
Add a new definition of a test item

Quality checking

qc_report()
QC report

Joining, subsetting and pivoting data

Extract longitudinal data in relation to other data, particularly admissions data

all_during()
Join adm data with other (standardised) data
first_during() last_during()
Extract first or last measurement during a timeperiod
max_during() min_during()
Extremes during
first_during_after_event() last_during_before_event()
Extract first measurement after/last measurement before a specific event, during a timeperiod
nearest_to_event_during() nearest_visit_start_during()
Extract measurements during a timeperiod nearest to a specific event
summarise_during()
Summarise (standardised) data during a time period

filter_person() filter_visit() filter_tests() filter_med_prescr() filter_numeric() filter_logical() filter_character()
General convenience functions for filtering

Coarsen by day
intersect_timeranges()
Intersect two timeranges
n_person() n_symbol()
Count functions
person_id_shorten()
Find shortest possible unique person_id
